category.title: Backing up & Restoring
category.description: As always, protecting yourself is the key to securing your cryptocurrency. Please make sure you properly save and back up your wallet!

childrenPage.title: How to properly save & back up your wallet

childMdx.excerpt: Preface The following assumes you are  not  using a hardware wallet. Due to their ease of use and security,  we recommend a hardware wallet for cold storage . To save / backup your  Ledger  or  TREZOR  device, simply write down the 24-word phrase on the card they provide and keep it very, very safe.
